name: Virtual Pet RPG
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam

Theme: COMBINE 2 INCOMPATIBLE (OR UNLIKELY) GENRES!

Design your own monster, look after it and send it out into the world to explore and battle!

Design your own monster to take on you into the world. Explore, battle and Care your way to get stronger and thrive in a fallen world.

- Completely Custom Character Creator
- Lots of cool items to collect
- Battle against monsters with a special Fire Flame
- Explore through 3 levels that are unique each time.
